Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class UserStatisticServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.UserStatisticServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserStatisticServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class UserStatisticServiceImpl extends Object implements UserStatisticServiceInterface
Service implementation for managing UserStatistic entities.

This service provides methods for creating, deleting, and retrieving statistics related to user activity. It interacts with the UserStatisticRepository to perform CRUD operations on user statistics.

Key Features:

  • Tracks the creation and removal of users.
  • Retrieves user statistics for all dates or a specific date.
  • Deletes statistics for a specific date.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • getUserStatistics

      public List<UserStatistic> getUserStatistics()
      Retrieves all user statistics.
      Specified by:
      getUserStatistics in interface UserStatisticServiceInterface
      Returns:
      a list of all UserStatistic entities

    • getUserStatisticByDate

      public UserStatistic getUserStatisticByDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the user statistic for a specific date.

      If no statistic exists for the given date, a StatisticNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      getUserStatisticByDate in interface UserStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to retrieve the user statistic
      Returns:
      the UserStatistic for the specified date
      Throws:
      StatisticNotFoundException - if no statistic is found for the given date

    • deleteStatisticByDate

      public void deleteStatisticByDate(LocalDate date)
      Deletes the user statistic for a specific date.

      This method will remove the user statistic entry from the repository for the given date.

      Specified by:
      deleteStatisticByDate in interface UserStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to delete the user statistic
      Throws:
      StatisticNotFoundException - if no statistic is found for the given date

    • createUserStatistic

      public void createUserStatistic(org.thewhitemage13.UserEvent userEvent)
      Creates or updates user statistics when a new user is registered.

      If no statistic exists for the current date, a new statistic is created with the number of new users set to 1. If a statistic already exists for the date, the number of new users is incremented.

      Specified by:
      createUserStatistic in interface UserStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userEvent - the event containing user information (used to track user registrations)

    • remoteUserStatistic

      public void remoteUserStatistic(org.thewhitemage13.UserEvent userEvent)
      Deletes or updates user statistics when a user is removed.

      If no statistic exists for the current date, a new statistic is created with the number of removed users set to 1. If a statistic already exists for the date, the number of removed users is incremented, and the number of new users is decremented.

      Specified by:
      remoteUserStatistic in interface UserStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userEvent - the event containing user information (used to track user removal)
